title: Basis and Coordinate System Visualizer
description: Side-by-side comparison of standard and custom basis coordinate systems showing how the same vector has different coordinate representations.
creator: Claude AI
subject: Linear Algebra
Vectors
Basis
Coordinate Systems

learningObjectives: Interpret how the same vector has different coordinates in different bases
Understand the relationship between basis vectors and coordinate grids
Recognize when a basis is valid vs. degenerate (parallel vectors)
Apply change of basis concepts visually

controls.name: Standard
controls.description: Sets custom basis to match standard basis

controls.name: Rotated 45°
controls.description: Rotates the custom basis by 45 degrees

controls.name: Stretched
controls.description: Sets basis vectors with different lengths

controls.name: Show Grid
controls.description: Toggles grid lines in both panels

controls.name: Show Projections
controls.description: Toggles projection lines to basis directions

controls.name: Vector
controls.description: Drag to move the vector (synced in both panels)

controls.name: Basis vectors b₁, b₂
controls.description: Drag to modify the custom basis
